column1: After victory in the [[War of the Last Alliance]], [[Isildur]], his nephew [[Meneldil]], and a company of trusted friends rode about the borders of Gondor. The Wold was one of their last stops before they journeyed to [[Amon Anwar]] where the tomb of [[Elendil]] was made.<ref>{{UT
